So you were changing channels back & forth and filming it?

  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: purplespacefriend 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Friday, July 17, 2009 8:14 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: The Fox


  =
  It is a TV, but I was sweeping the tuning just like a box. 

  F-S

  ---=
 In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:
  >
  >=
 Wait-the photo on the group page-that isn't a TV screen???

roups.com

  > Wellll, I didn't realize, this is one that's ev=
en had a litter under the grounds shed, and one of the guys used to bring i=
t food and water, so no wonder it's almost tame. Anyway, profound for me, I=
 usually scare away children, women and animals. Hopefully it's not the usu=
al eathquake sign, that would be scary! If you look at the shadow guy image=
 on the group home page, on his hat is wolf image, and this was just before=
 that big Afghan quake, plus it was showing up in the shower window--in the=
 steam. I used to do Native American type stuff, so the totem stuff has mea=
ning for me. 
  > 
  > Angels and Ghost has a psychic prediction page, and =
one they had listed, a soviet plane crash just happened--Russian plane, but=
 not it in Russia, and another is similar to what I'm getting, a big tsunam=
i for the east coast. I can't get the guys to give me a straight answer as =
to what hits in August--if anything. 
  > 
  > F-S
  >

yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@> wrote:

ckyard. As soon as they see us they bolt though.
